thread.title: Trump’s Pick for Ambassador to Israel Recants Harsh Attacks, Slurs
thread.title_full: Trump’s Pick for Ambassador to Israel Recants Harsh Attacks, Slurs - WSJ

author: Dion Nissenbaum
title: Trump’s Pick for Ambassador to Israel Recants Harsh Attacks, Slurs
text:
WASHINGTON—President Donald Trump’s nominee to be ambassador to Israel sought Thursday to distance himself from a series of his inflammatory comments that have hindered his quest to become a key member of the administration’s Middle East team.
Appearing before the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, bankruptcy lawyer David Friedman repeatedly expressed regret for comparing liberal Jewish groups to Nazi collaborators, for... RELATED VIDEO Trump-Netanyahu Meeting: Israelis, Palestinians React President Donald Trump's meeting with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu left many Israeli residents of Jerusalem satisfied and Palestinians disheartened, after Mr. Trump abandoned decades of insistence on a two-state solution as the basis for peace in the region. Photo: Getty Images.
